post:
#We are **[HostCram LLC](https://www.hostcram.com)**,
a US based Wyoming registered company (Filling ID 2016-000736577) posting our first DirectAdmin based hosting offer on Low End Talk.

**Our company registration can be [verified here](https://wyobiz.wy.gov/business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=153014087255104045146212210168127209107237105253).**

#Our DirectAdmin Hosting services includes:

100% Uptime SLA

45 Day Moneyback Guarantee

New York, US Location

Standard DDoS Protection

Let's Encrypt free SSL Certificates

CloudLinux, CageFS, PHP Selector

Unlimited MySQL Databases, Email Accounts, Parked Addon and Sub Domains

DirectAdmin Control Panel

Softaculous Premium (465+ Scripts Available)

Apache+Nginx Web Server

#Shared-10GB

    Unlimited Domains
    10 GB Disk Space
    100 GB Monthly Bandwidth
    Unlimited Email Accounts
    FREE SSL Certificates
    DirectAdmin & Softaculous

Price: $2.50 monthly / $12.50 yearly

#[Order Now](https://my.hostcram.com/order/config/index/directadmin-special/?group_id=29&pricing_id=315)


#Reseller-50GB

    50 GB Disk Space
    500 GB Data Transfer
    25 DA Accounts
    Overselling Not Allowed
    FREE SSL Certificates
    DirectAdmin & Softaculous

Price: $5 monthly / $25 yearly

#[Order Now](https://my.hostcram.com/order/config/index/directadmin-special/?group_id=29&pricing_id=317)

_Our terms of service can be found [here](https://www.hostcram.com/tos)._

#Accepted primary payment methods:

All Major Credit Cards, PayPal, Bitcoin, Altcoin and Bank Transfer (_Ask for others_)

#Control Panel Demo:

[DirectAdmin Login URL](https://earth.cramhost.com:2222)

Username: demo_user

Resellername: demo_reseller

Password: demo

_Note: Many features are disabled in demo mode. You can see basic control panel demo here._


#Server Configuration:

Intel Xeon E3/E5 Processor

32/64 GB DDR3/DDR4 ECC RAM

2-6 Raid Protected Drives

1 Gbps Premium Bandwidth

**All questions are answerable via [support ticket](https://my.hostcram.com/dashboard/plugin/support_managerpro/client_tickets/add/1/) and [messenger](https://m.me/hostcram). Don't forget to read our [TOS](https://www.hostcram.com/tos), [AUP](https://www.hostcram.com/aup) & [Privacy Policy](https://www.hostcram.com/privacy-policy) before signup. Thanks.**
